message: I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140.
Thank you for the offer. I appreciate your product and would like to make a counteroffer of $125.
I appreciate your counteroffer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $135.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $130 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $132.5, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
